Package pull_model

Class Dynamics<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pull_model.Dynamics<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of opinions handled by the agents.
    public class Dynamics<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The class handling the core of the dynamics, i.e., activating agents, sampling opinions, and checking if a consensus has been reached.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int nAgents
      The population size.
      boolean parallel
      Whether the activations are done in parallel or sequentially.

      • Dynamics

        agents - The set of agents involved in the dynamics.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run​(int T)
        Simulate the dynamics for a given number of parallel rounds.
        Parameters:
        T - Number of parallel rounds to be simulated.

      • run

        public int run​(pull_model.Dynamics.Predicate<T> pred)
        Simulate the dynamics until the specified predicate returns true.
        Parameters:
        pred - The condition to end the simulation.
        Returns:
        Number of parallel rounds until the predicate returns true.

      • run

        public int run()
        Simulate the dynamics until a consensus is reached.
        Returns:
        Number of parallel rounds until a consensus is reached.

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        Returns:
        Number of parallel rounds since initialization.

      • consensus

        public boolean consensus()
        Returns:
        Whether a consensus has been reached, i.e., all agents have the same opinion.
